price: Dhe thuaj (o Muhamed!): “O Zoti im, fal dhe mëshiro, se Ti je më i miri i mëshiruesve!”
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ وَٱرۡحَمۡ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi igh'fir wa-ir'ḥam wa-anta khayru al-rāḥimīna
